name: Compile IT
description:
COMPILE IT!

Hey guys, this is Thales from Thandoros!

This is the first game made by me, with a character inspired on my brother who is also an indie game developer.

I made 100% of the art, music composition and recording, and coding.

It is a 'Flappy Bird' style game where you 'fly' to debug and compile a software, avoiding 'bugs' and drinking mugs of programmer coffee!!!

Instructions: Press SPACE or LEFT MOUSE to fly. Avoid the bugs, the ceilling and the floor.
